report_title: Industry Report on Online Mortgage Brokers
executive_summary:
Figures have been adjusted for inflation and are presented in 2024 currency.

Online mortgage brokers have experienced significant growth in popularity in the last five years, offering innovative tools, products and services to help borrowers find the right mortgage for their needs and make informed financial decisions. They have adapted to changing market conditions with more flexible underwriting criteria, streamlined refinancing processes and customized services. Online mortgage brokers are expected to grow in popularity and offerings as they expand their services to more markets and demographics.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Home Purchases and Renovations Soar with More Time Being Spent at Home During the Quarantine
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Low-interest rates and increased disposable income during the pandemic resulted in a booming housing market and a staggering 33.8% jump in revenue in 2020.
Historically, regulation has tempered revenue, as new regulation imposes more substantial compliance costs and operation changes that undercut revenue gains.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Brokers must prepare for new regulations that might affect brokering home equity loans
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The most recent significant regulation affecting online mortgage brokers was in 2020.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: ONLINE MORTGAGE BROKERS ARE INCREASING IN POPULARITY
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Consumers are increasingly turning to online mortgage brokers for convenience and speed.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: ADVANCEMENTS IN TECHNOLOGY AND AUTOMATION ARE REDUCING TIME AND COSTS
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Online mortgage brokers use technology and automation to streamline the application process and reduce the time and cost associated with traditional mortgages.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: COMPETITION IS INCREASING IN THE MARKET
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The online mortgage brokers market has become increasingly competitive.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: DEMAND FOR LOANS WILL SLACK AS INTEREST RATES REMAIN HIGH
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Runaway inflation has forced the Federal Reserve to raise interest rates aggressively in the years since the pandemic.
It isn't sure whether the Fed will begin to lower or resume hiking rates, but the current high rates will have lingering effects for the next few years.

industry_definition: This industry includes companies that broker home mortgages online and companies that provide online mortgage marketplaces.
key_trends: Consumers' need for local knowledge limits market share concentration.
Economies of scale are essential to control market share.
Rising interest rates are reducing mortgage originations as consumers dodge the high cost of borrowing.

market_segmentation.segment_description: This market includes Gen Zers and younger millennials just entering the home-buying market.
This market includes millennials and young Gen Xers entering the prime home-buying years.
This market includes older Gen Xers and younger baby boomers amid their career and family-building years.
This market includes older baby boomers and members of the silent generation who are nearing retirement or are already retired.

products_and_services.product_description: Refinancing existing mortgages to get better terms.
Loans that allow homeowners to access their home equity.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: The percentage of services conducted online measures the popularity from both consumers and businesses of conducting business on the internet.

business_locations.location_description: Online mortgage brokers thrive in states with high housing costs, like California.
Consumers looking for warm weather tend to gravitate toward the Southeast to retire or for vacation homes.
The Mid-Atlantic is home to some of the most populated cities in the United States.

regulations_points.regulation_description: Mortgage brokers and businesses must obtain state licenses in order to operate.

regulations_points.regulation_title: SAFE MORTGAGE LICENSING ACT OF 2008 (SAFE ACT)
regulations_points.regulation_description: The Secure and Fair Enforcement for Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 ("SAFE Act") allowed states to pass legislation concerning the proper licensing of mortgage brokers.

basis_points.basis_title: Consumers' need for local knowledge limits market share concentration
basis_points.basis_description: Consumers' need for local knowledge limits market share concentration.

concentration_points.concentration_title: Established online mortgage brokers hold competitive advantage
concentration_points.concentration_description: Larger brokerages can compete with smaller regional brokers.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Competition for Talented Employees Spurs Wage Increase
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Online mortgage brokers' wages are high.

FAQs.question: How do you communicate the value of your company's services?
FAQs.answer: Online mortgage brokers offer customers increased access and options for comparing mortgage lender product offerings.
